name: kaji-opencode-relay
description: Universal relay for OpenCode â€” route AI coding sessions to any channel

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts src/types.ts src/adapter.ts src/store.ts src/schemas.ts src/debug/adapter.ts src/debug/cli.ts src/debug/renderer.ts --outdir dist --format esm --target node --external @opencode-ai/sdk --external zod --splitting && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs');for(const f of['dist/types.js','dist/schemas.js']){if(!fs.existsSync(f))continue;let c=fs.readFileSync(f,'utf8');const lines=c.split('\n');const last=lines.findLastIndex(l=>l.startsWith('export {'));const first=lines.findIndex(l=>l.startsWith('export {'));if(last>first){lines.splice(last,1);fs.writeFileSync(f,lines.join('\n'));}}"
